title: Organization

@id.title: Organization ID
@id.description: A unique identifier for the organization.

xdm:legalName.title: Organization Name
xdm:legalName.description: The official name of the organization.

schema:numberOfEmployees.title: Number of Employees
schema:numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees the organization has.

xdm:industry.title: Industry
xdm:industry.description: The the industry that this organization is a part of. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:classifier` property.

xdm:website.title: Web Site
xdm:website.description: The URL of the organization's website.

xdm:marketSegment.title: Market Segment
xdm:marketSegment.description: The named market segment that the organization participates in. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:identifier` property.

xdm:location.title: Location
xdm:location.description: The location of the organization's main office.

xdm:rating.title: Rating
xdm:rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this organization. `1` indicates the maximum possible rating, `0` the minumum possible rating.

xdm:identifier.title: Organization Identifier

xdm:duns.title: Dun & Bradstreet number
xdm:duns.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

.+://.+.description: ID of the organization according to the service.

xdm:identifier.description: This object contains unambiguous identifiers for the organization. Each key is the URI of an identification service, each value is the unique ID (or preferrably URI) of the organization as defined by the identification service.

xdm:classifier.title: Market/Industry Classifier

meta:keys.https://ns.adobe.com/external/isic4: International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC)

.+://.+.description: ID of the market or industry according to the service.

xdm:classifier.description: This object contains unambiguous classifiers for the organization. Each key is the URI of an classification service or standard, each value is the unique ID (or preferrably URI) of the organization as defined by the classification service.
